videos.author: CovertGoBlue
videos.title: HS player rates pro mtg cards from 1999
videos.description:
Guest @Rarran is time traveling with CGB to check out the decks and cards from the Magic: The Gathering 1999 World Championship. Will a Hearthstone player be able to figure out which deck was the most broken of them all?
